content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Max! I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. As the landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for the property. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month. Can you offer me a price within that range?

Also, I want to be on good terms with you so that I can renew my lease when it expires.

Lastly, I'm a student so I need a reliable and responsible landlord who will understand my needs and help me manage the apartment if necessary.

Is this something that you can provide?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for letting me know your budget, Max. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe we can come to an agreement within your budget. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please let me know how long you plan to stay in the apartment and whether you plan to sublet it or have roommates? This information will help me determine the best possible rental price for you.

Secondly, as a landlord, I do expect my tenants to be responsible and respectful of the property. If you have any questions or concerns about the terms of the lease or the responsibilities that come with renting the apartment, please feel free to ask.

Lastly, I'm happy to hear that you're a student and I understand the challenges that come with balancing school and living expenses. If you ever need any assistance or support while living in the apartment, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

With that said, I'm willing to negotiate a rental price that works for both of us. How does 950 Euros per month sound to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
That sounds great! I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month. I'm looking forward to moving in.

Thank you for being understanding and helpful throughout the negotiation process.

If I have any questions or concerns in the future, I'll be sure to reach out to you.

Best regards,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
You're welcome, Max! I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm here to help and ensure that your stay in the apartment is comfortable and enjoyable.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
